duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing content in the form of blog posts, articles, landing page content, and additional marketing content.
Crafting engaging content that is industry-specific and tailored to reach specific audiences.
Proficiency in researching and crafting thoughtful and engaging blog content, articles, landing page content, email copy to targeted audiences.
Being in tune with and open to learning more about overall content marketing efforts.
Collaborating with other members of the marketing team to ensure that all content is on target and optimized for specific audiences.
Reporting to the content management team in a timely manner and responding to emails in 24 hours or less.
Creating content that is optimized for SEO as well as conversions.
Meeting all deliverable deadlines and working well in a team/collaborative environment.
Being communicative and responsive to provide the best product to clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in English, Communications, Marketing, or related field
